benchmark_details.name: InsightBench
benchmark_details.overview: InsightBench is a benchmark dataset for evaluating large language model (LLM) agents on multi-step data analytics tasks using 100 synthetic datasets that simulate business use cases, accompanied by curated insights.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities of LLM-based agents in performing comprehensive data analytics, including formulating questions, interpreting answers, and generating insights.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark may not capture the full complexity of real enterprise data.

data.source: Synthetic datasets generated from the ServiceNow platform.
data.annotation: Manually annotated by expert data analysts.

methodology.calculation: LLaMA-3-Eval scores are computed to evaluate the insights generated by the agents against ground truth insights.
methodology.interpretation: Higher LLaMA-3-Eval scores indicate better performance in extracting accurate insights.
methodology.baseline_results: AgentPoirot outperforms existing analytics methods such as Pandas Agent.
methodology.validation: Validated through quality assurance by expert reviewers.
